description.value:
The Electronic Case Reporting Organization profile is based on the **US Core-Organization** profile and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing the following organizations for electronic case reporting:
- Initial Case Report source provider facility/office name - Initial Case Report source facility - Reportability Response recipients - Reportability Response responsible agency - Reportability Response routing entity - Reportability Response rules authoring agency
